verses.text: \w And|strong="H3068"\w* \w the|strong="H0559"\w* \w Lord|strong="H3068"\w* \w called|strong="H7121"\w* \w Moses|strong="H4872"\w*, \w and|strong="H3068"\w* \w spoke|strong="H1696"\w* \w to|strong="H0413"\w* \w him|strong="H0413"\w* \w from|strong="H0413"\w* \w the|strong="H0559"\w* \w tabernacle|strong="H0168"\w* \w of|strong="H3068"\w* \w the|strong="H0559"\w* testimony, \w saying|strong="H0559"\w*:

\w Speak|strong="H1696"\w* \w to|strong="H0413"\w* \w the|strong="H0853"\w* \w children|strong="H1121"\w* \w of|strong="H1121"\w* \w Israel|strong="H3478"\w*, \w and|strong="H1121"\w* thou shalt \w say|strong="H0559"\w* \w to|strong="H0413"\w* \w them|strong="H0413"\w*: \w The|strong="H0853"\w* \w man|strong="H0120"\w* \w among|strong="H4480"\w* \w you|strong="H3588"\w* \w that|strong="H3588"\w* \w shall|strong="H1121"\w* \w offer|strong="H7126"\w* \w to|strong="H0413"\w* \w the|strong="H0853"\w* \w Lord|strong="H3068"\w* \w a|strong="H3588"\w* sacrifice \w of|strong="H1121"\w* \w the|strong="H0853"\w* \w cattle|strong="H0929"\w*, \w that|strong="H3588"\w* \w is|strong="H3068"\w*, \w offering|strong="H7133"\w* victims \w of|strong="H1121"\w* \w oxen|strong="H1241"\w* \w and|strong="H1121"\w* \w sheep|strong="H6629"\w*,

\w If|strong="H0518"\w* \w his|strong="H3068"\w* \w offering|strong="H7133"\w* \w be|strong="H3068"\w* \w a|strong="H0518"\w* holocaust, \w and|strong="H3068"\w* \w of|strong="H3068"\w* \w the|strong="H0853"\w* \w herd|strong="H1241"\w*, \w he|strong="H0518"\w* \w shall|strong="H3068"\w* \w offer|strong="H7126"\w* \w a|strong="H0518"\w* \w male|strong="H2145"\w* \w without|strong="H8549"\w* \w blemish|strong="H8549"\w*, \w at|strong="H0413"\w* \w the|strong="H0853"\w* \w door|strong="H6607"\w* \w of|strong="H3068"\w* \w the|strong="H0853"\w* testimony, \w to|strong="H0413"\w* make \w the|strong="H0853"\w* \w Lord|strong="H3068"\w* favourable \w to|strong="H0413"\w* \w him|strong="H0413"\w*:

\w And|strong="H3027"\w* \w he|strong="H5921"\w* \w shall|strong="H3027"\w* \w put|strong="H3027"\w* \w his|strong="H5921"\w* \w hand|strong="H3027"\w* \w upon|strong="H5921"\w* \w the|strong="H5921"\w* \w head|strong="H7218"\w* \w of|strong="H3027"\w* \w the|strong="H5921"\w* victim, \w and|strong="H3027"\w* \w it|strong="H5921"\w* \w shall|strong="H3027"\w* \w be|strong="H3027"\w* \w acceptable|strong="H7521"\w*, \w and|strong="H3027"\w* help \w to|strong="H5921"\w* \w its|strong="H5921"\w* expiation.

\w And|strong="H1121"\w* \w he|strong="H0834"\w* \w shall|strong="H3548"\w* immolate \w the|strong="H0853"\w* \w calf|strong="H1241"\w* \w before|strong="H6440"\w* \w the|strong="H0853"\w* \w Lord|strong="H3068"\w*, \w and|strong="H1121"\w* \w the|strong="H0853"\w* \w priests|strong="H3548"\w* \w the|strong="H0853"\w* \w sons|strong="H1121"\w* \w of|strong="H1121"\w* \w Aaron|strong="H0175"\w* \w shall|strong="H3548"\w* \w offer|strong="H7126"\w* \w the|strong="H0853"\w* \w blood|strong="H1818"\w* thereof, pouring \w it|strong="H5921"\w* \w round|strong="H5439"\w* \w about|strong="H5439"\w* \w the|strong="H0853"\w* \w altar|strong="H4196"\w*, \w which|strong="H0834"\w* \w is|strong="H0834"\w* \w before|strong="H6440"\w* \w the|strong="H0853"\w* \w door|strong="H6607"\w* \w of|strong="H1121"\w* \w the|strong="H0853"\w* \w tabernacle|strong="H0168"\w*.
\w And|strong="H0853"\w* when they have flayed \w the|strong="H0853"\w* victim, they shall \w cut|strong="H5408"\w* \w the|strong="H0853"\w* joints into \w pieces|strong="H5409"\w*,

\w And|strong="H1121"\w* \w shall|strong="H3548"\w* \w put|strong="H5414"\w* \w fire|strong="H0784"\w* \w on|strong="H5921"\w* \w the|strong="H5921"\w* \w altar|strong="H4196"\w*, having \w before|strong="H5921"\w* \w laid|strong="H5414"\w* \w in|strong="H5921"\w* order \w a|strong="H5414"\w* pile \w of|strong="H1121"\w* \w wood|strong="H6086"\w*:

\w And|strong="H1121"\w* \w they|strong="H0834"\w* \w shall|strong="H3548"\w* \w lay|strong="H1121"\w* \w the|strong="H0853"\w* \w parts|strong="H5409"\w* \w that|strong="H0834"\w* \w are|strong="H0834"\w* cut \w out|strong="H5921"\w* \w in|strong="H5921"\w* order thereupon, \w to|strong="H5921"\w* wit, \w the|strong="H0853"\w* \w head|strong="H7218"\w*, \w and|strong="H1121"\w* all \w things|strong="H7218"\w* \w that|strong="H0834"\w* cleave \w to|strong="H5921"\w* \w the|strong="H0853"\w* liver,

\w The|strong="H3605"\w* \w entrails|strong="H7130"\w* \w and|strong="H3068"\w* feet being \w washed|strong="H7364"\w* \w with|strong="H3068"\w* \w water|strong="H4325"\w*: \w and|strong="H3068"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* \w priest|strong="H3548"\w* \w shall|strong="H3548"\w* \w burn|strong="H6999"\w* \w them|strong="H0853"\w* upon \w the|strong="H3605"\w* \w altar|strong="H4196"\w* \w for|strong="H4325"\w* \w a|strong="H3068"\w* holocaust, \w and|strong="H3068"\w* \w a|strong="H3068"\w* sweet savour \w to|strong="H3068"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* \w Lord|strong="H3068"\w*.

\w And|strong="H6629"\w* \w if|strong="H0518"\w* \w the|strong="H4480"\w* \w offering|strong="H7133"\w* \w be|strong="H2145"\w* \w of|strong="H4480"\w* \w the|strong="H4480"\w* hocks, \w a|strong="H0176"\w* holocaust \w of|strong="H4480"\w* \w sheep|strong="H6629"\w* \w or|strong="H0176"\w* \w of|strong="H4480"\w* \w goats|strong="H5795"\w*, \w he|strong="H0518"\w* \w shall|strong="H5795"\w* \w offer|strong="H7126"\w* \w a|strong="H0176"\w* \w male|strong="H2145"\w* \w without|strong="H8549"\w* \w blemish|strong="H8549"\w*:

\w And|strong="H1121"\w* \w he|strong="H3068"\w* \w shall|strong="H3548"\w* immolate \w it|strong="H5921"\w* \w at|strong="H5921"\w* \w the|strong="H0853"\w* \w side|strong="H5439"\w* \w of|strong="H1121"\w* \w the|strong="H0853"\w* \w altar|strong="H4196"\w* \w that|strong="H3068"\w* looketh \w to|strong="H5921"\w* \w the|strong="H0853"\w* \w north|strong="H6828"\w*, \w before|strong="H6440"\w* \w the|strong="H0853"\w* \w Lord|strong="H3068"\w*: \w but|strong="H5921"\w* \w the|strong="H0853"\w* \w sons|strong="H1121"\w* \w of|strong="H1121"\w* \w Aaron|strong="H0175"\w* \w shall|strong="H3548"\w* pour \w the|strong="H0853"\w* \w blood|strong="H1818"\w* thereof \w upon|strong="H5921"\w* \w the|strong="H0853"\w* \w altar|strong="H4196"\w* \w round|strong="H5439"\w* \w about|strong="H5439"\w*:

\w And|strong="H3548"\w* \w they|strong="H0834"\w* \w shall|strong="H3548"\w* divide \w the|strong="H0853"\w* joints, \w the|strong="H0853"\w* \w head|strong="H7218"\w*, \w and|strong="H3548"\w* all \w that|strong="H0834"\w* cleave \w to|strong="H5921"\w* \w the|strong="H0853"\w* liver: \w and|strong="H3548"\w* \w shall|strong="H3548"\w* lay \w them|strong="H0853"\w* \w upon|strong="H5921"\w* \w the|strong="H0853"\w* \w wood|strong="H6086"\w*, \w under|strong="H5921"\w* \w which|strong="H0834"\w* \w the|strong="H0853"\w* \w fire|strong="H0784"\w* \w is|strong="H0834"\w* \w to|strong="H5921"\w* \w be|strong="H3548"\w* put:

\w But|strong="H4325"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* \w entrails|strong="H7130"\w* \w and|strong="H3068"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* feet \w they|strong="H3068"\w* \w shall|strong="H3548"\w* \w wash|strong="H7364"\w* \w with|strong="H3068"\w* \w water|strong="H4325"\w*. \w And|strong="H3068"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* \w priest|strong="H3548"\w* \w shall|strong="H3548"\w* \w offer|strong="H7126"\w* \w it|strong="H1931"\w* \w all|strong="H3605"\w* \w and|strong="H3068"\w* \w burn|strong="H6999"\w* \w it|strong="H1931"\w* \w all|strong="H3605"\w* upon \w the|strong="H3605"\w* \w altar|strong="H4196"\w* \w for|strong="H4325"\w* \w a|strong="H7126"\w* holocaust, \w and|strong="H3068"\w* most sweet savour \w to|strong="H3068"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* \w Lord|strong="H3068"\w*.

\w But|strong="H0518"\w* \w if|strong="H0518"\w* \w the|strong="H0853"\w* oblation \w of|strong="H1121"\w* \w a|strong="H0176"\w* holocaust \w to|strong="H3068"\w* \w the|strong="H0853"\w* \w Lord|strong="H3068"\w* \w be|strong="H1121"\w* \w of|strong="H1121"\w* \w birds|strong="H5775"\w*, \w of|strong="H1121"\w* turtles, \w or|strong="H0176"\w* \w of|strong="H1121"\w* \w young|strong="H1121"\w* \w pigeons|strong="H3123"\w*,

\w The|strong="H0853"\w* \w priest|strong="H3548"\w* \w shall|strong="H3548"\w* \w offer|strong="H7126"\w* \w it|strong="H5921"\w* \w at|strong="H0413"\w* \w the|strong="H0853"\w* \w altar|strong="H4196"\w*: \w and|strong="H3548"\w* twisting \w back|strong="H0413"\w* \w the|strong="H0853"\w* neck, \w and|strong="H3548"\w* breaking \w the|strong="H0853"\w* place \w of|strong="H7218"\w* \w the|strong="H0853"\w* wound, \w he|strong="H0853"\w* \w shall|strong="H3548"\w* make \w the|strong="H0853"\w* \w blood|strong="H1818"\w* run \w down|strong="H7218"\w* \w upon|strong="H5921"\w* \w the|strong="H0853"\w* brim \w of|strong="H7218"\w* \w the|strong="H0853"\w* \w altar|strong="H4196"\w*.

\w But|strong="H0413"\w* \w the|strong="H0853"\w* \w crop|strong="H4760"\w* \w of|strong="H4196"\w* \w the|strong="H0853"\w* throat, \w and|strong="H4196"\w* \w the|strong="H0853"\w* \w feathers|strong="H5133"\w* \w he|strong="H0853"\w* shall \w cast|strong="H7993"\w* \w beside|strong="H0681"\w* \w the|strong="H0853"\w* \w altar|strong="H4196"\w* \w at|strong="H0413"\w* \w the|strong="H0853"\w* \w east|strong="H6924"\w* \w side|strong="H0681"\w*, \w in|strong="H0413"\w* \w the|strong="H0853"\w* \w place|strong="H4725"\w* \w where|strong="H4725"\w* \w the|strong="H0853"\w* \w ashes|strong="H1880"\w* \w are|strong="H1880"\w* wont \w to|strong="H0413"\w* be poured \w out|strong="H0413"\w*,

\w And|strong="H3068"\w* \w he|strong="H0834"\w* \w shall|strong="H3548"\w* break \w the|strong="H0853"\w* pinions thereof, \w and|strong="H3068"\w* \w shall|strong="H3548"\w* \w not|strong="H3808"\w* cut, \w nor|strong="H3808"\w* \w divide|strong="H0914"\w* \w it|strong="H1931"\w* \w with|strong="H3068"\w* \w a|strong="H0834"\w* knife, \w and|strong="H3068"\w* \w shall|strong="H3548"\w* \w burn|strong="H6999"\w* \w it|strong="H1931"\w* \w upon|strong="H5921"\w* \w the|strong="H0853"\w* \w altar|strong="H4196"\w*, putting \w fire|strong="H0784"\w* \w under|strong="H5921"\w* \w the|strong="H0853"\w* \w wood|strong="H6086"\w*. \w It|strong="H1931"\w* \w is|strong="H0834"\w* \w a|strong="H0834"\w* holocaust \w and|strong="H3068"\w* oblation \w of|strong="H3068"\w* most sweet savour \w to|strong="H5921"\w* \w the|strong="H0853"\w* \w Lord|strong="H3068"\w*.
